responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "B8FF068B4608B864D8804587A98865F3", "If the gods truly made this land for us, they are heartless beasts. Between the goblins and bandits I\'ve never felt so fearful to leave my home, and I have to wonder if Avenmoor can handle it all.")
name: DD_Ambient_Lionhold_Villagers_11
